name: Wii U Disk Image File
summary: Learn about .WUD files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: WUD files are most often created using Homebrew for Wii U. A user dumps the the game information from the Wii U game to the WUD file. Since the game information is large in size (over 20 GB), multiple WUD files are created to store segments (around 2 GB) of the game. Therefore, the files must be merged into one WUD file before the game can be opened and played by an emulator.
To open a WUD file in Cemu, select File â†’ Load and choose the WUD file you want to open.
You can compress a WUD file to save space on your computer using the Wii U image compression tool. Compressed WUD files become .WUX files.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
